translations: n．坚持，强调：坚定地要求或主张某事的行为。
· His insistences on the matter made it difficult for others to disagree.
他在这件事上的坚持使得其他人很难反驳。

sentences.sentence: "What is the reading of a text, in fact," she asks, "Except the recording of certain thematic recurrences, certain insistences of forms and meanings?"
sentences.translation: “实际上，阅读文本是什么呢，”她问，“如果它不是记录特定主题的出现频率、特定词汇的形式和意义的不一致的话？”
